name: Fahrenheit Frenzy
description:
Sneak around your house and find a way to turn up the thermostat so you can be warm. Be careful though, if Dad catches you out of bed this late at night you'll be grounded!

Designed and developed by Ghoul Bus

Disclaimer: Unfortunately I could not get a WebGL build of the game working. However, the Windows executable version is available for download and is fully functioning on the latest version of Windows 10.

TIPS
  • Some items can be picked up, throwing one of these at Dad will temporarily stun him
  • These moveable items can also be stacked in order to reach higher places
  • You can crouch behind large objects and hide under desks to avoid being seen
  • If you can't see Dad, his footsteps are a good indicator of where he is and whether or not he sees you. If Dad spots you, he'll start running towards you!
CONTROLS

WASD or ARROW KEYS to move

Shift to run

Space to jump

Left Control to crouch/slide

E to pickup/place items or hide

Left Mouse Button to use thermostat buttons

While holding an item, Left Mouse Button to throw

Escape to pause
